CustomField.description: Calculates the date of the Monday of the specified number of weeks after the batch start date.
CustomField.formula: ( Batch__r.Start_Date__c + ( Week_Number__c * 7 ) ) + ( 1 - MOD( ( Batch__r.Start_Date__c + ( Week_Number__c * 7 ) ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ) ) + IF( MOD( ( Batch__r.Start_Date__c + ( Week_Number__c * 7 ) ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ) > 1, 7, 0 )
CustomField.label: Week Start Date
